mapper.select: select * from scoredetail where DSerialNo=#{dutycode} and FSerialNo=#{fserialno}
mapper.delete:
delete from scoredetail where SerialNo in
#{detailSerialNos}
mapper.select: select SerialNo from scoredetail where FSerialNo=#{fserialno}
mapper.insert:
insert into scoredetail(SerialNo,FSerialNo, DSerialNo, Score,Ratio,ScoreType, dbtype) values
(#{detail.serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.FSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.DSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.score,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.ratio,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{detail.scoretype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.dbtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update.foreach:
update scoredetail
FSerialNo = #{detail.FSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DSerialNo = #{detail.DSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Score = #{detail.score},
Ratio = #{detail.ratio,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
ScoreType = #{detail.scoretype},
dbtype = #{detail.dbtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dbbk = #{detail.dbbk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SerialNo = #{detail.serialNo}

mapper.update:
update scoredetail
FSerialNo = #{detail.FSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DSerialNo = #{detail.DSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Score = #{detail.score},
Ratio = #{detail.ratio,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

mapper.select: SELECT sd.* FROM monthsummary m, scoreflow sf, scoredetail sd where m.SerialNo = sf.MSerialNo AND sf.SerialNo = sd.FSerialNo AND m.Year = #{year} AND m.Month = #{month} AND m.dbtype= #{dbtype}
